entity.description: Calendar representing the semi-annual span of time during which the financial activities of an organization are calculated.

attributes.name: userfiscalcalendarid
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the user who created the semiannual fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: salespersonid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the associated salesperson.

attributes.name: fiscalperiodtype
attributes.description: Type of fiscal period used in the sales quota.

attributes.name: effectiveon
attributes.description: Date and time when the semiannual fiscal calendar sales quota takes effect.

attributes.name: firsthalf
attributes.description: Sales quota for the first half of the fiscal year.

attributes.name: secondhalf
attributes.description: Sales quota for the second half of the fiscal year.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the semiannual fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Date and time when the quota for the semiannual fiscal calendar was created.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the semiannual fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Date and time when the semiannual fiscal calendar was last modified.

attributes.name: businessunitid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the business unit with which the calendar is associated.

attributes.name: exchangerate
attributes.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the semiannual fiscal calendar with respect to the base currency.

attributes.name: timezoneruleversionnumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: transactioncurrencyid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the semiannual fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: utcconversiontimezonecode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: importsequencenumber
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

attributes.name: firsthalf_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent for the sales quota for the first half of the fiscal year.

attributes.name: secondhalf_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the second half of the fiscal year.

attributes.name: createdonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the semiannualfiscalcalendar.

attributes.name: modifiedonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the semiannualfiscalcalendar.
